spec_data.Name: rubygem-maruku
spec_data.Description:
Maruku is a Markdown interpreter in Ruby. It features native export to HTML
and PDF (via Latex). The output is really beautiful!
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 04:49:21 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Maruku is a Markdown-superset interpreter written in Ruby
